title: Seeking Protection For Children
description: Authentic supplications for Seeking Protection For Children
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Seeking Protection For Children. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 146
items.arabic: كَانَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم يُعَوِّذُ الحَسَنَ وَالحُسَينَ رضي الله عنهما ((أُعِيذُكُمَا بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّةِ مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ وَهَامَّةٍ، وَمِنْ كُلِّ عَيْنٍ لاَمَّةٍ)).
